# Beta rozdělení

## Odhad parametru $\alpha$ pro zafixované $\beta$

$\beta$=0.5

### Momentova metoda
$\overline{Xn} = \alpha/(\alpha + 0.5)$


#### Odhad $\alpha$ na zaklade jedne simulace

```{r}
x = rbeta(1000, 1,0.5)
x_mean= mean(x)
odhad_alfa = (0.5)* x_mean / (1-x_mean)
odhad_alfa
```


#### Porovnani pro 1000 simulaci

```{r}
odhady = c(rep(0,1000))

for (i in 1:1000) {
  x = rbeta(1000, 1,0.5)
  x_mean= mean(x)
  odhad_alfa = (0.5)* x_mean / (1-x_mean)
  odhady[i] = odhad_alfa
}
mean(odhady)
```

```{r}
hist(odhady)
```
